title: Graphic Designer
text: Pros Big name clients and lots of creative collaboration. Cons Over 100 employees so its a little competitive but everyone at Knock Inc. is incredibly professional and kind. Advice to Management Keep up the good work!
pros: Big name clients and lots of creative collaboration.
cons: Over 100 employees so its a little competitive but everyone at Knock Inc. is incredibly professional and kind.

title: Good Job.
text: Pros Works with schedule. Good pay. Great management. Cons Self-contracted work. Knocking doors can be hard.
pros: Works with schedule. Good pay. Great management.
cons: Self-contracted work. Knocking doors can be hard.
